name: ALIVE Photo: Journey into the Wild with Pro photographers!
blurb: NEW Online Community of Passionate People Learning Photography from National Geographic level Pros.

name: Sean's Northern Light Photography Tours
blurb: An exceptionally unique and intimate photography experience underneath the northern lights in Yellowknife, Northwest Territories.

name: The Great Southwestern Suzuki Adventure!
blurb: Utah photographer to travel Southwest documenting 'modern Americana,' while challenging the false construct of pristine wilderness.

name: Capturing Backyard Bugs.... Through Photography!
blurb: There's a fascinating world of insects right outside your home! After attending BugShot, I'll use my new skills to make a photo book

name: Newfoundland: Shore to Shore - A Photographic Journey
blurb:
I will be documenting my journey throughout Newfoundland via a lens to showcase this diverse island
www.nlshoretoshore.com

name: 2016 Calendar: Landscapes of the World + Canvas Prints!
blurb: Help me create a 2016 calendar from my photography that brings 12 awe-inspiring landscapes from around the world to your kitchen wall!

name: The Solstice Project
blurb: Iceland. The Midnight Sun. This June, I will capture the photographs of a lifetime in a location like no other.

name: Idaho: A Visual Journey. Image Slideshow & Wallpapers on DVD
blurb: Over 100 striking Idaho landscape images compiled into a slideshow set to classical music plus 20 favorite desktop wallpapers.

name: North Woods Wildlife: Sparking Curiosity In Young Learners
blurb: Through trail camera images I intend to spark curiosity and appreciation for the natural world in students of all ages.

name: Majestic and Magical - Come Explore The Nature Isle!
blurb: A fine art photo-book featuring stunning images of Dominica, compiled to showcase the Caribbean island's unequaled natural beauty.

name: Photo Finnish: Wildlife and Nature Photography in Finland
blurb: A photographic journey through Lapland, the Arctic Circle, and Finland featuring wildlife, landscapes, and the aurora borealis.

name: The Ozark Trail: Images of Missouri's Longest Hiking Trail
blurb: My project is to print a full-color photographic book of the Ozark Trail. Maps and information of the area are also included.

name: Trees Are My Muse: A Tale of Love and Friendship
blurb: More than a photo book, this is a tribute to trees who breathe out the air we breathe in. A whispered story beautifully illustrated.

name: Light Chaser
blurb: Solo photography show at Gallery 24, in Rochester, MN. I use my photos to make a bold, modern representation of the color spectrum.

name: Eastern Sierra Observatory & Stargazing Glampground
blurb: Observatory -  Astrophotography - Stargazing Glampground - Hot Tub - Under the dark skies of California's Eastern Sierra!

name: Secrets from the Stars
blurb: A high-quality hardcover book with 8 night photography masterclasses, each written by a world-class, award-winning astrophotographer

name: What the F? The Photographic Adventures of Erica Lane Harvey
blurb: 51 Wildlife & Landscape Feature Photos with Stories, Plus Photo Tips! A funny, beautiful and heartwarming adventure.

name: Sacred Nature Volume 2: Reconnecting People to Our Planet
blurb: A large coffee-table book showcasing the beauty & wonder of our planet in 288 pages of black & white and color fine art photography.

name: Weaver: Fine Art Photography Book
blurb: A dreamy photobook about Olympic National Park.

name: Shimoda Explore v2
blurb: The new adventure camera bag collection for travel and landscape photographers from Shimoda

name: HIGH QUALITY FLOATING HIDE/BLIND FOR WILDLIFE PHOTOGRAPHERS
blurb: Enjoy wildlife photography! Make your own awesome low level images of birds and mammals on the water surface.

name: ORIZZONTI SIMBRUINI, il libro
blurb: Un emozionante viaggio fotografico alla scoperta della natura e del paesaggio dei Monti Simbruini, nell'Appennino centrale.

name: Wild Space Card Deck
blurb: A deck of 42 nature cards and companion booklet to invite sacred conversation and spiritual deepening.
